author: RTÉ News
title: Easter Bunny an 'essential worker' during virus crisis
description: The Prime Minister of New Zealand has assured children that both the Easter Bunny and Tooth Fairy were essential workers during the Covid-19 pandemic.
content:
The Prime Minister of New Zealand has assured children that both the Easter Bunny and Tooth Fairy were essential workers during the Covid-19 pandemic. 
During a press conference in Wellington, Jacinda Ardern was asked whether any exemption was being consider… [+1973 chars]
